title: The YouTube app for Android is getting video transcriptions
content:
The YouTube app for Android is getting a handy little feature that will let you view the complete transcription of any video right on the app. The feature was previously limited to the desktop version of YouTube, but it’s now showing up for a couple of users on Android. Android Police reports that the feature

The post The YouTube app for Android is getting video transcriptions appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The YouTube app on Android is finally getting the video transcription feature that has been available on YouTube desktop for a while. Read on to learn more.
